StoryText: I'm at a White Elephant Christmas party and am about to choose a gift.
Question: Which gift should I choose?

OptionText.Text: The present in blue gift wrapping paper.
The present in yellow gift wrapping paper.

OptionResult.Result: I open it up and it is a set of resistance fitness bands.
OptionResult.DiaryEntry: These resistance bands are great! I started using them as soon as I got home and they really help me to get in better shape pretty quickly.

OptionResult.Result: It's an assortment of different flavored potato chips.
OptionResult.DiaryEntry: I actually love this! It has so many great flavors of potato chips! I start eating some of them as soon as I get home and keep eating them all through the week. It definitely makes me happy but it also makes me feel... slow... and out of shape.
